ethics.policyTitle: Disclaimer on Academic Integrity and Ethical Policy
ethics.p1: Trans-Gate is committed to providing translation and educational support services in line with high professional and ethical standards. Our mission is to deliver accurate, clear, and helpful guidance while promoting honest learning and academic integrity.
ethics.p2: We offer translation, tutoring, editing, reviewing, and consultation services for students, researchers, and professionals who seek to expand their knowledge, improve academic writing, and develop research skills. We do not complete assignments, write research papers, theses, dissertations, or any academic work on behalf of clients, nor do we create or alter content in ways that mislead or violate ethical standards.
ethics.p3: Any assistance provided — whether translation, feedback, reviewing, or editing — is intended solely for learning, improvement, and communication purposes. Misusing our services is strictly prohibited. Submitting provided materials as original work without proper acknowledgment violates academic integrity and professional ethics.
ethics.highlight: By continuing to use our services, clients agree to comply with this ethics policy and to support responsible, ethical learning and professional practices.

translationArticle.title: Translation: Bridging Communication and Building Connections
translationArticle.subtitle: Why professional translation matters in business, academia, healthcare, public services, and cultural exchange.

s1.title: Why Translation Matters
s1.body: In today’s interconnected world, translation is not a simple service — it is a vital tool that enables institutions and individuals to communicate clearly across languages and cultures.

s2.title: More Than Word Substitution
s2.body: Professional translation preserves meaning, tone, and purpose. It also considers cultural context, industry terminology, and the needs of the target audience.

s3.title: Translation in Business
s3.body: Businesses rely on translation to build trust and credibility. When customers receive information in their language, misunderstandings decrease, engagement improves, and brand reputation strengthens.

s4.title: Translation in Academia & Research
s4.body: Translation expands access to knowledge by making research, articles, and educational materials available worldwide, supporting learning and international academic collaboration.

s5.title: Rights, Safety & Public Services
s5.body: In law, healthcare, and government services, accurate translation can be critical. It helps protect rights, reduce risks, and ensure people understand obligations and essential instructions.

s6.title: A Connector Between Cultures
s6.body: Translation strengthens human and cultural connection. It enables people to understand each other through values, literature, arts, and global communication, building respect and shared understanding.

tech.title: Technical Notes for a Professional Website Experience
tech.b1: Use a professional sans-serif font such as Inter or Open Sans for body text.
tech.b2: Use a maximum of two font families: one for headings and one for body text.
tech.b3: Ensure Arabic and English typography are balanced and readable on web layouts.
tech.b4: Maintain proper spacing and line height (~1.5) for paragraphs to improve readability.
tech.b5: Use WOFF2 font formats to improve performance and loading speed.
tech.b6: Ensure full responsiveness on mobile and desktop — and test both layouts carefully.
